sentences.sentence: It soon grew as an entrepot town due to its strategic location along the busy shipping routes connecting Europe to China.
sentences.translation: 由于其沿着连接欧洲和中国的繁忙航运路线的战略位置，它很快发展成为一个贸易中心城镇。

sentences.sentence: If you are in the entrepot trade and re - export goods, you can get back the ~ you paid when you imported.
sentences.translation: 如果你经营转口贸易或再出口货物，你可拿回进口时所付关税。

sentences.sentence: The industrial park is green, beautiful, the entrepot will strive to become a first-class garden style are.
sentences.translation: 整个园区内绿树成荫、环境优美，创业园将力争成为一流的花园式园区。
